Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 91 of 197 2632
LHCmax3 Dubin - direct
1 THE WITNESS: Right.
2 THE COURT: You may inquire, Mr. Pagliucca.
3 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor.
4 DIRECT EXAMINATION
5 BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
6 Q. Good morning. Is it Dr. Dubin?
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. Dr. Dubin, where do you live, not the address, but just generally.
9 A. I live in New York City.
10 Q. Thank you. And how old are you, Dr. Dubin?
11 A. I'm 60.
12 Q. And I take it you are married by your description of your last name?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. And what is your husband's name?
15 A. Glenn Dubin.
16 Q. How long have you been married to Glenn Dubin?
17 A. 28 years.
18 Q. And do you and Mr. Dubin have any children?
19 A. Yes, we do.
20 Q. How many children do you have?
21 A. We have three children.
22 Q. What are the ages of your children, starting with the oldest?
23 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014197

text_blocks.content:
THE WITNESS: Right.
THE COURT: You may inquire, Mr. Pagliucca.
MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor.
DIRECT EXAMINATION
BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
Q. Good morning. Is it Dr. Dubin?
A. Yes.
Q. Dr. Dubin, where do you live, not the address, but just generally.
A. I live in New York City.
Q. Thank you. And how old are you, Dr. Dubin?
A. I'm 60.
Q. And I take it you are married by your description of your last name?
A. Yes.
Q. And what is your husband's name?
A. Glenn Dubin.
Q. How long have you been married to Glenn Dubin?
A. 28 years.
Q. And do you and Mr. Dubin have any children?
A. Yes, we do.
Q. How many children do you have?
A. We have three children.
Q. What are the ages of your children, starting with the oldest?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
